Sql.CDATA:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'CKARRSummary' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[CKARRSummary] GO CREATE VIEW CKARRSummary AS
SELECT CompanyID, CampaignSourceID, AVG(InvoiceAmt) AS AvgAmt, AVG(InvoiceAmt) * 12 AS ARRAmt FROM dbo.CKARRDetail GROUP BY CompanyID, CampaignSourceID
